item.description:
Eight to the Bar at West Hartford Town Hall

Swing Dances are on the first Fridays of the month, at the air conditioned
West Hartford Town Hall, 50 S. Main Street, West Hartford, CT

Check out the free beginners' workshop from 7:30-8:30pm, with dancing 8:30-11:30pm.
Dance admission is $12
Swing attire recommended
No alcohol or drugs

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: SWING DANCE!
